thread.title: Co-op Bank faces sale as losses top £200m

title: Co-op Bank faces sale as losses top £200m
text:
Bitcoin boss faces rearrest over missing £1.6m Published 1 minute ago 
The boss of the Mt Gox bitcoin exchange in Tokyo is expected to be rearrested on suspicion of taking £1.65 million from customers’ accounts Phoenix opts for outsider to replace Davies Published 1 minute ago 
Britain’s biggest consolidator of closed life assurance funds has turned to the head of WH Smith’s board to be its new chairman China jitters send shares tumbling across world Published 1 minute ago 
Britain’s biggest listed companies suffer a painful fall as shares tumbled to within one point of their lowest level this year JPMorgan recruits Pentagon’s big gun Published 1 minute ago 
Ray Odierno, the former US Army chief of staff, has been hired by America’s largest bank to advise on international risks and cybersecurity only a week after he retired Find
